evidence.claim: CareTeam Solutions utilizes AWS cloud infrastructure for scalability and reliability.
The platform complies with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of patient data.
Supports FHIR protocols for healthcare data exchange.
Integration patterns include connecting EHR systems via standardized APIs.
Claims processing supported via HIPAA X12 transaction sets.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction support or clearinghouse functionality found.
